title: SapDatasphereDBConnection
description: SAP Datasphere Database User Connection Config

hostPort.title: Host and Port
hostPort.description: Host and Port of the SAP Datasphere HANA Cloud database. Format: hostname:port (e.g., abc123-hana.hanacloud.ondemand.com:443)

username.title: Database Username
username.description: Database username for SAP Datasphere. Create a Database User in Space Management > Database Access > Database Users. Format: SpaceName#SuffixName (e.g., MYSPACE#OPENMETADATA)

password.title: Database Password
password.description: Password for the database user. This is provided when you create the database user in SAP Datasphere.

databaseSchema.title: Database Schema
databaseSchema.description: Database Schema (Space) of the data source. This is optional. When left blank, OpenMetadata will attempt to scan all accessible spaces.

database.title: Database
database.description: Database name. This is optional, defaults to 'SYSTEMDB' for SAP Datasphere.
